name: Spott.com
tag_list: daily-deals, consumer-internet, deal-aggregator, buy, bloomspot, groupon, save, group-buying, charity, community-building
overview:
Spott (www.spott.com) is a daily deal site offering discounts of up to 90% off local entertainment, services and restaurants. Spott is committed to helping unite and build communities through the common thread of giving.

Coining the term â€œgroup-giving,â€ Spott automatically donates up to 50% of its proceeds to sponsored charities. The actual donated amount is dependent upon a unique sliding scale system that allows for higher donations with increased purchases.

As summarized through its â€œGive.Get.Enjoy.â€ tagline, giving happens on all levels with Spott, whether its giving customers an experience, giving merchants more traffic, or giving charities more support. Spott’s sole purpose is to bring every part of the community together to create positive change.

milestones.description: Launched Spott.com with first daily deal.
Launching of Spott.com in San Diego
milestones.source_description: Daily Deals Site Will Donate to Charities to Promote "Group-Giving"

milestones.description: The San Diego Better Business Bureau approved Spott.com as an accredited A+ business with no customer complaints.
milestones.source_description: San Diego Better Business Bureau Review Reliability Report

milestones.description: Donates all of proceeds to the San Diego/Imperial County Red Cross to benefit Japan relief aids instead of the usual 15 - 50 percent to charity.
milestones.source_description: New Daily Deal Site Donates 100 percent of Proceeds for Earthquake Relief Efforts in Japan

milestones.source_description: Spott.com partners with Parellel 6 to launch new Mobile App

external_links.title: Spott.com Donates 100 Percent of Proceeds to Help Earthquake Victims in Japan
